timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| outer_join 0
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| sub
| top 5

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/used_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/used_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| sub
| top 5

{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | union
; fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes }
  | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes }
  | union
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| sub
| top 5

fetch k8s_node
| { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

{{ fetch k8s_node
  | metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
; fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| join
| sub;
{ fetch k8s_node
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
; fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| join
| sub} | union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

{ fetch k8s_node
  | metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
  | align next_older(2m)
  | every 2m
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
; fetch k8s_node
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes
  | align next_older(2m)

  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum() }
| union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]

| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
